title: Massive Shake-up For Battlefield Franchise Revealed - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.02.21
description:
Tim and Tam cover the big things happening at EA with Battlefield, as well as the cancelled Need for Speed TV show and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:20 - Housekeeping
There’s a new Kinda Funny Gamescast up right now featuring Blessing, Tim Gettys, and special guest Sancho West. It’s Blessing giving my review of Solar Ash and then the crew spend some time alking about Halo eSports. Obviously, there is a big old tangent about Last of Us Factions. It’s a must listen episode that’s available over on youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast services around the globe.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy &  Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:06:40 - Battlefield Franchise Undergoes Major Shake-Up – GameSpot, Eddie Makuch
00:17:20 - The Original Titanfall Is No Longer Available For Sale, But The "Universe Will Continue" -- GameSpot, Cameron Koch
00:21:45 - Nvidia Is Releasing A New 12GB RTX 2060 To Address Shortages -- GameSpot, Hayley Williams
00:27:00 -  Ad
00:30:15 -  Cancelled Need For Speed TV Show Details Revealed – GameSpot, Darryn Bonthuys
00:35:00 -  -  The Matrix Awakens; An Unreal Engine 5 Experience has appeared in the PSN backend – Reddit
00:38:05 - Twenty percent of Xbox Cloud Gaming players only use touch controls - Tom Warren, The Verge
 00:42:40 - Out today
00:48:20 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Janet & Rebekah Valentine
